data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Maputo City, Mozambique and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Maputo City, Mozambique
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Maputo City.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Maputo City that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 1,533,671 lost in Maputo City that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Yao, Muslim people. Make the Yao, Muslim people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Maputo City, Mozambique.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Maputo City to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

data.section_summary:
the state of Maputo City, Mozambique has a population of 1,766,200.

We estimate Maputo City has 232,529 people who might know Jesus, 692,999 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 840,672 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Maputo City, Mozambique to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,533,671 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood
